import React from 'react'; import { Shield, CheckCircle, AlertTriangle, BarChart2, GraduationCap, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAnalytics } from '../context/AnalyticsContext'; const ResumeAnalytics = () => { const { analyticsData } = useAnalytics(); const getStatusIcon = (status) => { if (status === 'verified') { return ; } return ; }; const getStatusText = (status) => { if (status === 'verified') { return Verified; } return Pending; }; return (
{/* Interactive background elements */}
{/* Content */}
{/* Header */}

AuthentiScan

Upload and verify your resume for authenticity

Secure Analysis

Skill Analysis

{getStatusIcon(analyticsData.technicalSkills.status)} Technical Skills
{getStatusText(analyticsData.technicalSkills.status)}
{getStatusIcon(analyticsData.softSkills.status)} Soft Skills
{getStatusText(analyticsData.softSkills.status)}

Experience Validation

{getStatusIcon(analyticsData.employment.status)} Previous Employment
{getStatusText(analyticsData.employment.status)}
{getStatusIcon(analyticsData.education.status)} Education
{getStatusText(analyticsData.education.status)}

Overall Score

{analyticsData.overallScore}%

Resume Authenticity Score

{analyticsData.overallScore === 0 ? "Upload a resume to get started" : "Based on multiple verification factors"}

); }; export default ResumeAnalytics;
